ThingDef.Name: AOR_Melee_Haumesser_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Haumesser "Keiler"
ThingDef.description: Even after nuclear annihilation, this knife was used in the countless trenches of a dead world. Forged from heavy steel, it is nevertheless unusually sharp and robust, making it useful despite its horrific appearance.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Melee_Grabenaxt_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Grabenaxt "Bertha"
ThingDef.description: The Grabenaxt (=trench axe) is a heavy weapon that was gladly used by stormtroopers to clear trenches. Easy to make, heavy and effective.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Melee_Streitaxt_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Industrie-Streitaxt "Hoelz"
ThingDef.description: A heavy battle axe made of steel. It is expensive to make and requires a lot of steel, but it is powerful and can penetrate even the thickest armor. According to legend, a weapon like this was wielded by an anti-imperial bandit named Max Hoelz, who - according to legend - cut off 100 heads of nobles and hung them on his shack deep in the wasteland.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Melee_Uruk_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Industrie-Schwert "Uruk"
ThingDef.description: The Uruk is a crude mass-produced piece of burnt steel, heavy and unwieldy, yet sharp and easy to produce. The weight of the weapon makes it slow, but deadly.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Melee_Crom_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Breitschwert "Crom"
ThingDef.description: This oversized, super-heavy broadsword was made from raw industrial steel and has terrifying penetrating power. A famous warrior who once slaughtered an entire royal gala event with such a sword answered the question about the best thing of life: "To crush your enemies, see them driven before you, and hear the lamentation of those glitterworld pigs!"\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Melee_CommieChainaxe_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Kettenaxt "Eumeswil"
ThingDef.description: Another barbarian weapon whose use is forbidden on most Glitterworlds. The Kettenaxt (=chain axe) is a heavy, clunky weapon whose sharp saw teeth eat through armor, flesh, and bone alike./n/A gruesome weapon that is frighteningly easy to craft.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Melee_CommieChainsword_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Kettenschwert "Haifisch"
ThingDef.description: Another barbarian weapon whose use is forbidden on most Glitterworlds. The Kettenschwert (=chain sword) is a heavy, clunky weapon whose sharp saw teeth eat through armor, flesh, and bone alike./n/A gruesome weapon that is frighteningly easy to craft.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Melee_M1Bayonet_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona M1 Bayonet
ThingDef.description: A widely used steel M1 bayonet.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Melee_EnfieldBayonet_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona MKVII Bayonet
ThingDef.description: A widely used steel MKVII bayonet, heavy and brutal.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Melee_Spear_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Power Spear "Thumper"
ThingDef.description: A desperate but clever weapon, the heavy, steel spearhead is assisted on impact by a primtive hydraulic system, allowing it to punch through even the thickest armor.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Melee_Pickaxe_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Crude Pickaxe "Gulag"
ThingDef.description: An effective tool used by prisoners in penal colonies to do the dangerous tunnel work. The tool is heavy and clumsy, but it is a very good weapon against the insectoids that crawl by the thousands through the narrow, stuffy mountain passages. Or to start an uprising against the guards.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Melee_Hammer_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Power Hammer "Arbeiter"
ThingDef.description: A heavy servo hammer that is a useful tool in the stuffy factories and manufactories, and has also proven to be an effective self-injuring tool due to its tremendous impact force.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Thalmann_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona StG17 "Thalmann"
ThingDef.description: A heavy, brutal weapon whose high caliber ammunition can crack even the thick armor of imperial soldiers. The Thalmann was once used in a bloody civil war on a distant, highly industrialized midworld. Today, it is often used by militias to fighting and defending against mechanoids and imperials.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Thalmann_GunJug_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona StG17 "Thalmann" (jungle style)
ThingDef.description: A heavy, brutal weapon whose high caliber ammunition can crack even the thick armor of imperial soldiers. The Thalmann was once used in a bloody civil war on a distant, highly industrialized midworld. Today, it is often used by militias to fighting and defending against mechanoids and imperials. This one has two magazines.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Thalmann_GunChain_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Kreischer-StG17 "Thalmann"
ThingDef.description: A heavy, brutal weapon whose high caliber ammunition can crack even the thick armor of imperial soldiers. The Thalmann was once used in a bloody civil war on a distant, highly industrialized midworld. Today, it is often used by militias to fighting and defending against mechanoids and imperials. The Kreischer-Sturmgewehr (=screamer assault rifle) is a rare variant of the StG-17 and the result of an industrial worker wanting to further improve a super-heavy, armor-piercing weapon. The heavy industrial circle saw penetrates even the thickest armor and is responsible for some of the galaxy's worst war crimes. The weapon is banned on many Glitterworlds and is considered the murder tool of barbarians and madmen.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Thalmann_GunJugChain_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Kreischer-StG17 "Thalmann" (jungle style)
ThingDef.description: A heavy, brutal weapon whose high caliber ammunition can crack even the thick armor of imperial soldiers. The Thalmann was once used in a bloody civil war on a distant, highly industrialized midworld. Today, it is often used by militias to fighting and defending against mechanoids and imperials. The Kreischer-Sturmgewehr (=screamer assault rifle) is a rare variant of the StG-17 and the result of an industrial worker wanting to further improve a super-heavy, armor-piercing weapon. The heavy industrial circle saw penetrates even the thickest armor and is responsible for some of the galaxy's worst war crimes. The weapon is banned on many Glitterworlds and is considered the murder tool of barbarians and madmen. This one has two magazines and yeah... It's the ultimate killing machine.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Rotfront_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona StB33 "Rotfront"
ThingDef.description: The Sturmbatterie-33 was developed during a civil war on a distant, highly industrialized midworld. A heavy and brutal weapon created to gain the upper hand in the narrow alleys and nooks of industrial cities. Today, it's a nightmare for tribals and often used by slavers and space pirates.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Spartakus_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Colt 6520 "Liebknecht"
ThingDef.description: A Colt 6520 10mm autoloading pistol. Each pull of the trigger will automatically reload the firearm until the magazine is empty. Single shot only, using the powerful 10mm round. This modification has an integrated brass knuckle for close combat.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Spartakusauto_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Colt 6620 "Maryupol"
ThingDef.description: A Colt 6620 10mm automatic pistol. Each pull of the trigger will automatically reload the firearm until the magazine is empty. Single shot only, using the powerful 10mm round. This automatic, lighter version allows for faster rate of fire at the expense of accuracy.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Spartakusdoppel_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Grenade Launcher "Klopfer"
ThingDef.description: A grenade launcher that has proven itself in countless wars. The small nuclear grenades leave no room for fancy, tactical maneuvers.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Dillinger_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona MP45 "Dillinger"
ThingDef.description: Once, this was the standard SMG of a revolutionary army on a distant midworld. Sprays a lot of powerful 10mm bullets, but has a small magazine.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Dillinger_GunJug_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona MP45 "Dillinger" (jungle style)
ThingDef.description: Once, this was the standard SMG of a revolutionary army on a distant midworld. Sprays a lot of powerful 10mm bullets. If you are a public enemy on a crusade against the royalists, this gun is your choice; you will need the extra ammo.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_1887_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Sturmflinte M3087 "Partisan"
ThingDef.description: An old shotgun, made for urban combat. Someone has attached sharp steel spikes to the lower lever. Now, it's the best friend for all who tried to survive in the harsh rimworld.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_BAR_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona 3018BAR "Ryker"
ThingDef.description: A light machine gun that served as the standard weapon for a revolutionary army in a long-forgotten war. Scholars of the Glitterworlds agree that the weapon is probably a modification of the ancient M1918 BAR.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_BAR_Gunjug_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona 3018BAR "Ryker" (junge style)
ThingDef.description: A light machine gun that served as the standard weapon for a revolutionary army in a long-forgotten war. Scholars of the Glitterworlds agree that the weapon is probably a modification of the ancient M1918 BAR. This one has a jungle style mag.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_10mmSMG_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Volks-MP9 "Luxemburg"
ThingDef.description: A cheap but reliable SMG issued to the last line of defense in a long forgotten war. The weapon has a high magazine capacity and relatively high damage, but is very inaccurate and designed to fight in the narrow alleys, bunkers and tunnels.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_10mmSMGBIG_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Volks-MP9-H "Ensslin"
ThingDef.description: A modified and heavy variant of the standard MP9. Affectionately called the "Hand-MG" by some. The Ensslin is heavier and more robustly built. Weapons like these are still popular with outlaws and scavengers today.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_10mmSMG_Gunjug_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Volks-MP9 "Luxemburg" (jungle style)
ThingDef.description: A cheap but reliable SMG issued to the last line of defense in a long forgotten war. The weapon has a high magazine capacity and relatively high damage, but is very inaccurate and designed to fight in the narrow alleys, bunkers and tunnels. This gun is a typical model used today by criminals, flakeheads and other scum. No matter how high you are, point Rosa at the target, pull the trigger and something will hit it.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_10mmSMG_Gunchain_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Kreischer-MP9 "Luxemburg"
ThingDef.description: A cheap but reliable SMG issued to the last line of defense in a long forgotten war. The weapon has a high magazine capacity and relatively high damage, but is very inaccurate and designed to fight in the narrow alleys, bunkers and tunnels. This one has a illegal Kreischer-Addon, a industrial buzzsaw which cut skin, bones and armor like a piece of butter.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_10mmSMG_Gunjugchain_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Kreischer-MP9 "Luxemburg" (jungle style)
ThingDef.description: A cheap but reliable SMG issued to the last line of defense in a long forgotten war. The weapon has a high magazine capacity and relatively high damage, but is very inaccurate and designed to fight in the narrow alleys, bunkers and tunnels. This gun is a typical model used today by criminals, flakeheads and other scum. No matter how high you are, point Rosa at the target, pull the trigger and something will hit it. This one has a illegal Kreischer-Addon, a industrial buzzsaw which cut skin, bones and armor like a piece of butter.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Agitator_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona SiS 12.7mm "Agitator"
ThingDef.description: Some also call the SiS the little sister of the StG17. A heavy, powerful automatic pistol with high recoil and deadly explosive rounds. It was once used by the elite troops of a vanished socialist nation in the war against the royalists.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Agitator_Gunjug_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona SiS 12.7mm "Agitator" (jungle style)
ThingDef.description: Some also call the SiS the little sister of the StG17. A heavy, powerful automatic pistol with high recoil and deadly explosive rounds.. It was once used by the elite troops of a vanished socialist nation in the war against the royalists.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_GarandM1_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona M1 Garand "Nagasaki"
ThingDef.description: A once very common, reliable rifle. Used by both sides during a long-ago civil war between royalists and socialists due to its ease of manufacture and reliability. Ultimately, the war was decided not by the M1 Garand, but by the massive use of nuclear weapons.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_GarandM1bayo_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona M1 Garand "Nagasaki"(bayonet)
ThingDef.description: A once very common, reliable rifle. Used by both sides during a long-ago civil war between royalists and socialists due to its ease of manufacture and reliability. Ultimately, the war was decided not by the M1 Garand, but by the massive use of nuclear weapons. This one was equipped with a bayonet.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Thorne_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Grabenflinte M39 "Thorne"
ThingDef.description: The Thorne is a heavy combat shotgun that was preferably used to clear trenches and occupied houses with explosive shotgun ammunition. The gun has a very high rate of fire, firing one shot charge with each pump of the trigger. In a long-forgotten war between royalists and socialists on a world drowned in nuclear fire, an emperor called the use of this weapon a war crime.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_ThorneShort_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Grabenflinte M39 "Thorne" (sawed off)
ThingDef.description: The Thorne is a heavy combat shotgun that was preferably used to clear trenches and occupied houses with explosive shotgun ammunition. The gun has a very high rate of fire, firing one shot charge with each pump of the trigger. In a long-forgotten war between royalists and socialists on a world drowned in nuclear fire, an emperor called the use of this weapon a war crime. With a sawed-off stock, the Thorne becomes only slightly lighter, but much more manageable.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_ThorneChainsaw_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Grabenflinte M39 "Stalin"
ThingDef.description: The M39 is a heavy combat shotgun that was preferably used to clear trenches and occupied houses with explosive shotgun ammunition. The gun has a very high rate of fire, firing one shot charge with each pump of the trigger. In a long-forgotten war between royalists and socialists on a world drowned in nuclear fire, an emperor called the use of this weapon a war crime. Well, with the attached chainsaw, the trench warfare is twice as much fun!\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_10mmSMGdoppel_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Lever-Bolter "Genosse"
ThingDef.description: The Lever Bolter looks visually like a larger, heavier version of the Wasteland Shotgun, however, that's where the similarities end. Loaded with modified bolt-action bullets whose explosion can rip the flesh from a tribesman's bones, the Lever-Bolter is the trusted companion of colonists, bounty hunters, and trappers everywhere in the Rimworlds.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Shelby_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona MP53 "Shelby"
ThingDef.description: The MP53 is a further development of the MP45, which attempts to repair the flaws of its predecessor. A much larger helical magazines and make it possible to take a whole area under fire. The Shelby enjoyed particular popularity among the outlaws and gangsters of the filthy slums of a long-forgotten factory world. Later, after a nuclear war, it was mainly used to clean the narrow tunnels of the Vaults.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_ShelbyShort_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona MP53 "Shelby" (Commando)
ThingDef.description: The MP53 is a further development of the MP45, which attempts to repair the flaws of its predecessor. A much larger helical magazines and make it possible to take a whole area under fire. The Shelby enjoyed particular popularity among the outlaws and gangsters of the filthy slums of a long-forgotten factory world. Later, after a nuclear war, it was mainly used to clean the narrow tunnels of the Vaults. For better handling, the shaft has been removed from this model.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Mao_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Type 93 "Mao"
ThingDef.description: A very common rifle, mostly used by militas. The Mao is easy to use and produce, but has a heavy recoil.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Maobayo_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Type 93 "Mao" (bayonet)
ThingDef.description: A very common rifle, mostly used by militas. The Mao is easy to use and produce, but has a heavy recoil. The heavy MKVII bayonet makes the weapon harder to control, but makes it a valuable tool in trench and house fighting.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Elysium_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Type 93 "Elysium"
ThingDef.description: The barrel-mounted elysium amplifier was originally used in mining and was intended to give industrial drilling machines greater efficiency through magnetic acceleration. On the Type 93, however, the amplifier causes a significant acceleration of the cartridge as it passes through the barrel, resulting in enormous armour penetration. This effect is increased by the explosive charges of the bullets. Despite its weight and chunky appearance, the Elysium is expensive and rare and can rival the effectiveness of the powerful Redblok bolter, but will probably never go into mass production.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Maojug_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Type 93 "Mao" (jungle style)
ThingDef.description: A very common rifle, mostly used by militas. The Mao is easy to use and produce, but has a heavy recoil.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Elysiumjug_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Type 93 "Elysium" (jungle style)
ThingDef.description: The barrel-mounted elysium amplifier was originally used in mining and was intended to give industrial drilling machines greater efficiency through magnetic acceleration. On the Type 93, however, the amplifier causes a significant acceleration of the cartridge as it passes through the barrel, resulting in enormous armour penetration. This effect is increased by the explosive charges of the bullets. Despite its weight and chunky appearance, the Elysium is expensive and rare and can rival the effectiveness of the powerful Redblok bolter, but will probably never go into mass production.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Kim_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Type 93A "Kim"
ThingDef.description: A very common rifle, mostly used by militas. The Type 93A is equipped with a helical magazine and is often used for fire support.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_ElysiumKim_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Type 93A "Elysium"
ThingDef.description: The barrel-mounted elysium amplifier was originally used in mining and was intended to give industrial drilling machines greater efficiency through magnetic acceleration. On the Type 93, however, the amplifier causes a significant acceleration of the cartridge as it passes through the barrel, resulting in enormous armour penetration. This effect is increased by the explosive charges of the bullets. Despite its weight and chunky appearance, the Elysium is expensive and rare and can rival the effectiveness of the powerful Redblok bolter, but will probably never go into mass production.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Maojugbayo_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Type 93 "Mao" (jungle style/bayonet)
ThingDef.description: A very common rifle, mostly used by militas. The Mao is easy to use and produce, but has a heavy recoil. The heavy MKVII bayonet makes the weapon harder to control, but makes it a valuable tool in trench and house fighting.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Hoxha_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Type 93 "Hoxha"
ThingDef.description: A modifed Type 93, mostly used by criminals, psychopaths and terrorist. The Hoxha has a bigger magazine and a crude chainsaw bayonet.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Bolt_Bow_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Bolt Bow "Julie"
ThingDef.description: Countless worlds fell to the royal janissaries and countless tribals were enslaved to serve the amusement of the nobles. The Bolt Bow is the desperate, primitive attempt to defend against the armored troops: Heavy, shod with iron and strung with a steel string, the arrowhead is made from a captured bolt bullet. The weapon is crude but effective and, according to legend, takes its name from a black-haired Amazon who was the only one to survive a pirate captain's attack on her village. She swore bloody revenge and - depending on the narrator - she got it or was enslaved herself.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Rocket_Bow_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Rocket Bow "Eastley"
ThingDef.description: Countless worlds fell to the royal janissaries and countless tribals were enslaved to serve the amusement of the nobles. The Rocket Bow is the desperate, primitive attempt to defend against the armored troops: Heavy, shod with iron and strung with a steel string, the arrows are upgraded with crude rockets to speed up projectile.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Chemfuel_Bow_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Flamer Bow "Arroyo"
ThingDef.description: Countless worlds fell to the royal janissaries and countless tribals were enslaved to serve the amusement of the nobles. The Rocket Bow is the desperate, primitive attempt to defend against the armored troops: Heavy, shod with iron and strung with a steel string, the arrows are upgraded with crude rockets to speed up projectile. The Arroyo is modified with a unstable Chemfuel tank to set the arrows on fire.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Callahan_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Bolt Revolver "Callahan"
ThingDef.description: The Callahan is a heavy bolt revolver whose explosive rounds will crack even the thickest armor. Often used by desperadoes and cynical lawmen.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_ChainCallahan_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Bolt Chain-Revolver "Callahan"
ThingDef.description: The Callahan is a heavy bolt revolver whose explosive rounds will crack even the thickest armor. Often used by desperadoes and cynical lawmen. For this modified version of the Callahan Revolver, the revolver cylinder was replaced with a cartridge belt, and the trigger lever was enlarged to allow for a faster but less accurate rate of fire. Along with the heavy bolt cartridges and the recoil, the Chain Revolver is as powerful as it is inaccurate. This weapon is only used by experienced shooters or fools who break their wrists from the recoil.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_RedBlok_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona StG33 "RedBlok"
ThingDef.description: The further development of the Thalmann. The RedBlok was developed in times of greatest need and is allegedly based on stolen blueprints from a murderous cult. Instead of high-caliber ammunition, the RedBlok shoots explosive rounds that cause terrible damage. It is unknown whether the RedBlok was able to save its builders, but the deadly and robust weapon can still be found throughout the galaxy today.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_RedBlokA_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona StG33-A "RedBlok"
ThingDef.description: The further development of the Thalmann. The RedBlok was developed in times of greatest need and is allegedly based on stolen blueprints from a murderous cult. Instead of high-caliber ammunition, the RedBlok shoots explosive rounds that cause terrible damage. It is unknown whether the RedBlok was able to save its builders, but the deadly and robust weapon can still be found throughout the galaxy today. The StG-33A uses a helix magazin.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_NapalmRedBlokA_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona StG33-A "Katyusha"
ThingDef.description: The further development of the Thalmann. The RedBlok was developed in times of greatest need and is allegedly based on stolen blueprints from a murderous cult. Instead of high-caliber ammunition, the RedBlok shoots explosive rounds that cause terrible damage. It is unknown whether the RedBlok was able to save its builders, but the deadly and robust weapon can still be found throughout the galaxy today. The StG-33A uses a helix magazin, loaded with chemfuel bolts. Whoever developed this weapon must have really hated the royalists: When the explosive rounds penetrate the power armor, the unfortunate soldiers are cooked by the napalm in their own armor.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_RedBlokbayo_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Boxer-StG33 "RedBlok"
ThingDef.description: The further development of the Thalmann. The RedBlok was developed in times of greatest need and is allegedly based on stolen blueprints from a murderous cult. Instead of high-caliber ammunition, the RedBlok shoots explosive rounds that cause terrible damage. It is unknown whether the RedBlok was able to save its builders, but the deadly and robust weapon can still be found throughout the galaxy today. This model has a boxer bayonet. The jackhammer smashes stones, armor and bones alike.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_10mmSMGdoppel_Gunchain_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona StG33-HMG "Stahlgewitter"
ThingDef.description: Heavy, unwieldy, inaccurate, but equipped with enormous firepower: the heavy bolter, called only Storm of Steel because of its penetrating power in a long-forgotten war, can blanket an entire area with explosive bolt bullets and stop just about any enemy advance.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Bulldog_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Sturmpistole P87 "Bulldog"
ThingDef.description: A heavy assault pistol capable of firing semi automatic explosive bolt rounds. The weapon is frighteningly easy to manufacture, reliable and effective, but unadorned, primitive and brutal. In the upscale circles of the Glitterworlds, weapon like this are considered tools of the mob.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Enfield_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Lee-Enfield MKVII "Sid"
ThingDef.description: An antique BOLT-action rifle whose blueprints have been reused and modified due to its robust construction. The MKVII shoots explosive bolt rounds that burst guts and armor alike.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Enfieldsniper_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Lee-Enfield MKVII "Zaitsev"
ThingDef.description: An antique BOLT-action rifle whose blueprints have been reused and modified due to its robust construction. The MKVII shoots explosive bolt rounds that burst guts and armor alike. This one has a scope.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Enfieldbayo_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Lee-Enfield MKVII "Sid" (bayonet)
ThingDef.description: An antique BOLT-action rifle whose blueprints have been reused and modified due to its robust construction. The MKVII shoots explosive bolt rounds that burst guts and armor alike.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AOR_Weimar_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Eisenkeule K14 "Weimar"
ThingDef.description: The Weimar is neither an elegant nor an imaginative weapon. It's a mixture of an iron club and a shotgun loaded with two bolt cartridges instead of buckshot. It is inaccurate, brutal, unreliable, but was once a popular weapon among political hooligans and often seen in the bloody street fights of a perished midworld.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.
